name: Cumulative CO2 emissions (OWID based on GCP, 2017)
title: Cumulative CO2 emissions (OWID based on GCP, 2017)
description: Data converted from carbon into carbon dioxide (using conversion factor of 3.67). Data for Australia appears to be negative from 1851-1858; for clarity, these figures have been renormalised to zero.

sources.name: Cumulative CO2 emissions (OWID based on GCP, 2017)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Le Quéré et al. (2017). Global Carbon Project.
sources.additionalInfo: Data converted from carbon into carbon dioxide (using conversion factor of 3.67). Data for Australia appears to be negative from 1851-1858; for clarity, these figures have been renormalised to zero.
